name: Geneforge Saga
description:
Geneforge Saga includes: Geneforge 1 - Mutagen Unique, truly open-ended fantasy adventure in a strange, new world. Use battle or cunning to change the world, served by your own army of custom-made mutant monsters. Over 80 zones to explore and 50+ hours of gameplay. Multitudes of skills, abilities, factions, treasures, and servants to create. Geneforge 2 - Infestation Wildly open-ended adventure in a unique fantasy world. Use battle or diplomacy and trickery to change the world, served by an army of custom-made mutant monsters. Almost 90 zones to explore and 50+ hours of gameplay. Enormous range of abilities, factions, quests, and paths to victory.
The Geneforge Saga is a true indie game cult classic. Sprawling, unique, and innovative, the five games in this epic were released twenty years ago. They had complex stories in a unique world. They were completely open-ended. You could join any of a multitude of factions, scorch the world with your personal army of custom-made mutant monsters, or play the pacifist and use diplomacy and trickery to reach any ending without every attacking a foe.

Spiderweb Software has been creating modern, expanded remasters of these classics, with tons more quests and material, improved graphics and sound, and a modern interface. This bundle lets you join the multitude of gamers who have been enjoying this exotic series for decades. On the cheap!

Languages, features and system requirements may vary between games - please check individual product pages for details.
